room_title: Escape room "FBI Mafia Investigation" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: This was my first escape room and I had a blast! Our group did the FBI Mafia room - so fun! The game was exciting yet challenging. Staff was wonderful. Great team building experience. I highly recommend and will definitely be coming back for another room soon!

room_title: Escape room "FBI Mafia Investigation" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: So much fun! We became FBI agents and we achieved our goal. We ESCAPED! So impressed with the intricacy of the game. We went as a small group and bonded even more with each other. I would highly recommend this experience and the staff was so friendly and helpful. Great time.

room_title: Escape room "FBI Mafia Investigation" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: We went to Urban Escape as a farewell get together and had the best time!! I play escape games online ALL the time so I thought that this would be a piece of cake, not so much! Lol it helped but the room was much harder!! A great challenge and we will DEFINITELY be back!!

room_title: Escape room "FBI Mafia Investigation" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: Had a great time with my family! Game was innovative and challenging. The staff was professional, friendly and sincere in their efforts to make sure we got the most out of our visit. I will definitely be going back to try the other rooms!
